publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5147 Stuart McMillan: Glenfiddich Piping Champion—That the Parliament congratulates Stuart Liddell of Inveraray, who beat nine of the best solo pipers in the world to become the Glenfiddich Piping Champion of 2009; notes that the pipers in the competition must perform in both the piobaireachd and the march, strathspey and reel traditions, and further notes that this is one of the highest achievements in the piping world.

S3M-5147 Stuart McMillan: Glenfiddich Piping Champion—That the Parliament congratulates Stuart Liddell of Inveraray, who beat nine of the best solo pipers in the world to become the Glenfiddich Piping Champion of 2009; notes that the pipers in the competition must perform in both the piobaireachd and the march, strathspey and reel traditions, and further notes that this is one of the highest achievements in the piping world.
S3M-5147 Glenfiddich Piping Champion (lodged on 5 November 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Rob Gibson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Willie Coffey*, Christine Grahame*, Bill Kidd*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-5147 Glenfiddich Piping Champion (lodged on 5 November 2009) Ken Macintosh*
S3M-5147 Glenfiddich Piping Champion (lodged on 5 November 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-5147 Glenfiddich Piping Champion (lodged on 5 November 2009) Dave Thompson*, Robin Harper*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-5147 Glenfiddich Piping Champion (lodged on 5 November 2009) Maureen Watt*
S3M-5147 Glenfiddich Piping Champion (lodged on 5 November 2009) Bob Doris*, Linda Fabiani*
S3M-5147 Glenfiddich Piping Champion (lodged on 5 November 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
